    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void process(Configurations.SetupConfig config)
      A derived class should process the given config and either call notifySubscribers() or send a CurrentState message to itself (possibly from a worker actor) to indicate changes in the current HCD state.
      void requestCurrent()
      A request to the implementing actor to publish the current state value by calling notifySubscribers().
